assignment

Class MainCourse

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.MainCourse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MenuItem

    public class MainCourse
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuItem
    Contains the details of a main course item in the menu, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not). Derived from the interface MenuItem.
    Author:
    neethumohanan
